title: Workshop on Anthropometric Data Analysis
text: This website is developed for the Anthropometric Data Analysis Workshop organized by the Department of Community and Family Medicine, All India Institute of Medical Sciences, Bhopal. This website hosts workshop resource materials for the use of participants.

title: Resources
text:
Information about tools

section: Canadian Pediatric Endocrine Group - Shiny Apps for Anthropometric Calculations
text:
Canadian Pediatric Endocrine Group - Shiny Apps for Anthropometric Calculations

who2007: a Shiny app for children ages 5–19 years, based on the WHO growth reference
Growth chart plotter for WHO (for children 2–19 years) and US CDC (2–20 years)
Growth chart plotter for WHO for children 0–2 years
How to create csv files and calculate age in months in excel?
